title: jAnakI vallabha
sahitya:
jAnakI vallabha namastE jagat paripAlaka namastE


anupallavi

  bhAnukula tilaka patita pAvana santatam mama hrdayAmbujavAsa


caraNam    agaNita guNa dhAman shrI rAmA ahalyA shApa vimOcana bhUman
 sugrIvAdi sEvita ghanashyAma sumadhura nAman paripUrNa kAma kumAra sAkEta dhAman
